queries.QUERY_GET_ASSET_OPERATION_BY_ASSET_ID_AN: from AssetOperationInfo where assetId = :assetId and assetOperationType = :assetOperationType
queries.QUERY_GET_ASSET_OPERATION_DATA_BY_ASSET_: select assetOperationData from AssetOperationInfo where assetId = :assetId and assetOperationType =:assetOperationType
queries.QUERY_GET_ASSET_OPERATION_DATA_BY_ID: select assetOperationData from AssetOperationInfo where id = :id
